text: Péter Haumann (17 May 1941 – 28 May 2022) was a Hungarian actor. He appeared in more than one hundred movies. His career began in 1962 and he retired in 2021. Haumann was born in Budapest, Hungary. Haumann was known for his roles in Ten Thousand Days, Woyzeck, Sound Eroticism and Kalandorok. Haumann died on 28 May 2022 in Budapest at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian movie actors Category:Hungarian stage actors Category:Hungarian television actors Category:Actors from Budapest
title: Péter Haumann
